name: Len-chan's Lemon Field Sow Seed
description:
I'm going to sow seed in the lemon field. It's a preparation for the cultivation of lemon.
In the Len-chan's lemon field, let's prepare to cultive lemon.

She has finished cleaning and plowing the lemon field, so this time let's sow seed in the lemon field.
Compete with each other to show which can sow more seed.

You can play solo and multi-player game.
Outdoors everywhere, play BlueTooth multi-player with your friends.
Indoors, play Wi-Fi multi-player with people all over the world.

Luck is the most important element in this game, so whether you are young, old, male, female, you can play equally.
Literally, you can reverse the game, so until the end of the game, you never know which will win.
A new standard family game shows.

In the fall, a good harvest must come in the Len-chan's lemon field.

The final episode of Len-chan trilogy!!!
